summary: The diff shows modifications to frontend/src/components/Header.tsx that add an 'Admin Panel' button with a ShieldCheck icon styled in gold to both desktop and mobile navigation menus, navigating to #/admin. This directly addresses REQ-1 and all its acceptance criteria. The implementation includes the handleAdminClick function, desktop button with gold styling, and the file summary confirms mobile menu inclusion as well.

hallucinated_features.description: A discreet low-opacity 'Admin' link was also added to the Footer component pointing to #/admin route
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only specifies adding the Admin Panel button to the main navigation header (Header.tsx). Adding it to Footer.tsx was not requested in the build requirements.
